item.title: Whats your media player?
item.description: I’m starting a reader survey on Media Players - as there are a few assumptions I wanted to prove or understand.

item.title: Apple to standardise iTunes prices in Europe
item.description: comment: The reason that Apple charges different retail prices in each market is due to the differences in wholesale prices charged in each market by the major labels.
